sense.def:
To slap someone
pomeni udariti nekoga z dlanjo.

seg.quote: He slapped her across the face.
Give him a slap if he is too much of a pest.

sense.def:
To slap someone on the back
pomeni nekoga prijateljsko udariti po hrbtu.

seg.quote: I slapped him on the back and wished him the best of luck.

sense.def:
To slap something onto a surface
pomeni nekaj postaviti nekam hitro in nepazljivo, pogosto z veliko silo.

seg.quote: All you have to do is slap a bit of Sellotape across it.
He slapped the report down on the table.
